Mobiles.Name: dog
Mobiles.Long_Description: The dog sniffs about the street looking for scraps
Mobiles.Description: The dog is the only innocent person in the entire city

Mobiles.Name: carpet merchant
Mobiles.Long_Description: The merchant sells carpets for a expensive fee
Mobiles.Description: The carpet merchant would con you out of your underwear

Mobiles.Name: fanatic
Mobiles.Long_Description: The fanatic looks at you for signs of witchcraft
Mobiles.Description: The smell of the fanatic knocks you over

Mobiles.Name: horse
Mobiles.Long_Description: The horse is patiently awaiting its masters return
Mobiles.Description: The horse is large and horse-shaped

Mobiles.Name: sheep
Mobiles.Long_Description: A Sheep is standing here looking stupid
Mobiles.Description: The sheep looks like a cloud with legs

Mobiles.Name: cow
Mobiles.Long_Description: A Cow is standing here chewing its curd
Mobiles.Description: The cow is black and white

Mobiles.Name: Doctors Receptionist
Mobiles.Long_Description: The Receptionist does not want you to see the doctor

Mobiles.Name: doctor
Mobiles.Long_Description: The doctor trembles in fear at the thought of being tried for witchcraft
Mobiles.Description:
The doctor has used magic, and if the disciples of Arasham find out they 
will burn him at the stake.

Mobiles.Name: Disciple
Mobiles.Long_Description: Ulesim, is the most favoured of the disciples of Arasham
Mobiles.Description: Ulesim is ugly stupid and smelly

Mobiles.Name: knight
Mobiles.Long_Description: Martel is plotting on ways to destroy the Pandion Order
Mobiles.Description:
Martel has long white hair even though he is not very old.  He is proficient 
in the styric secrets.

Mobiles.Name: knight
Mobiles.Long_Description: Mirrelek looks like a prosperous cattle seller
Mobiles.Description:
Mirrelek is actually a Knight of the Pandion order is disguise.  His real 
name is Perrein

Mobiles.Name: Arasham
Mobiles.Long_Description: Arasham is calling the faithful to prayer
Mobiles.Description:
Arasham is an old man with bad teeth.  He is half mad, hald deaf and totally 
unwashed

Mobiles.Name: fanatic
Mobiles.Long_Description: The fanatic attacks anyone who does not look like one of the holy
Mobiles.Description: The fanatic is stupid and unwashed

Mobiles.Name: prisoner
Mobiles.Long_Description: The prisoner is scared out of its wits
Mobiles.Description: The prisoner has done nothing except scare the wrong people

Mobiles.Name: seller
Mobiles.Long_Description: The man tries to sell you holy relics
Mobiles.Description: The man looks back at you!

Mobiles.Name: seller
Mobiles.Long_Description: The man tries to sell you holy writings
Mobiles.Description: The man looks back at you!

Mobiles.Name: Guard
Mobiles.Long_Description: This man is here to protect Arasham's Tent

Objects.Name: Ramshorn
Objects.Description: The horn is from Eshands holy lamb

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: this is a fake magical item.

Objects.Name: sheepskin leggings
Objects.Description: Some sheepskin leggings are lying here

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The skin is still dripping blood

Objects.Name: Black Robe
Objects.Description: A piece of stinking black cloth is lying on the ground

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The robe is woven from rough threads

Objects.Name: fake ramshorn
Objects.Description: A piece of horn is lying on the ground

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: This is as much a horn from eshand's lamb as the original, not at all.

Objects.Name: bumble bee
Objects.Description: A creature that flicks between a bumble bee and a fairy is flying about here

Objects.Name: carpet
Objects.Description: A large carpet is laid out on the floor

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The pattern is of a camel

Objects.Name: club nail
Objects.Short_Description: a club with nails in it
Objects.Description: A piece of wood with nails hammered through it is lying on the ground

Objects.Name: Knight Sword
Objects.Description: A large sword obviously designed for choping and slashing is lying here

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The sword of a Pandion Knight

Objects.Name: broken mace
Objects.Description: The mace on the ground is chipped and broken

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: This mace looks as if it would fall to pieces if you hit someone with it

Objects.Name: Spear
Objects.Description: The spear has a rotting wooden shaft and a rustying head

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The spear is as blunt as a brick

Objects.Name: Holy symbol
Objects.Description: The holy symbol is discarded in the dust

Extra_Descr_Data.Description: The sign of a forgotten god.

Objects.Name: word eshand
Objects.Description: The word of eshand is floating in the air

Extra_Descr_Data.Description:
It is a standard Justice Hall issue club.  Many a Perp's
head has been bashed with this baby.

Objects.Name: Scroll eshand
Objects.Description: The scroll of eshand is lying on the ground

Objects.Name: scroll arasham
Objects.Description: The scroll of arasham is lying in the dirt

Objects.Name: dragonquest666
Objects.Description: A Platinum Dragonstone lies here gleaming.

Objects.Name: toy
Objects.Description: A dogs toy has been thrown into a corner

Objects.Name: long sword
Objects.Description: A long dangerous sword is lying on the ground

Rooms.Name: Outside A Desert City
Rooms.Description:
The sand to the north has been blasted by the sun for centuries giving it a 
strange glow.

There is a sign here which reads

*****************************************

             City Of Dabour
       Birthplace of Holy Eshand

   Come Hear the Holy Arasham Preach
*****************************************

Exits.Description: You see the glowing sand of the badlands.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

This is a junction with roads running East, North and South.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The street runs west and south.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The street runs north to south. To the west is the door to the buildings 
holding Ulesim's tent.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north and west.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north, east and south.  To the west you can hear the bleating 
of sheep.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north to south.  To the west you can hear the lowing of cattle.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north, south and east.  There is a merchants stand to the west.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs west to east.  There are merchants stands to the north and 
south.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs west and south.  There is some sort of trader to the north, 
strange smells emanate from a doorway.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north to south.  There are moans of discomfort from the west.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north and west.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs west to east.  There is a large tent to the south.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

To the south there is what passes for a mansion in this city.  The road 
runs north and east.

Rooms.Name: Dabour City Street
Rooms.Description:
The street is hot and dusty.  The buildings that line each side are 
dilapidated, and some of the roofs have fallen in so badly that people 
have been forced to put a tent inside.

The road runs north to south.  From the west there is the sound of horses.

Rooms.Name: Tent of Ulesim
Rooms.Description: This tent is untidy and carries Ulesims strange odour

Rooms.Name: Cattle Pens
Rooms.Description: The area is filled with pens that would be perfect for holding animals

Rooms.Name: Sheep Pens
Rooms.Description: The area is filled with pens that would be perfect for holding animals

Rooms.Name: Seller of holy writings
Rooms.Description:
The merchants stall is filled with fake artefacts that even the most 
stupid would be suspicious off.

Rooms.Name: Stable
Rooms.Description: There are horses stalls lining the walls, each is filled with fresh hay.

Rooms.Name: Carpet Seller
Rooms.Description:
The carpet seller's stall is piled high with carpets of all colours and 
types.

Rooms.Name: Seller of holy items
Rooms.Description:
The merchants stall is filled with fake artefacts that even the most stupid 
would be suspicious off.

Rooms.Name: Arasham Guard Post
Rooms.Description:
This space is perfect for the men to keep watch on whoever tries to get into 
Arashams tent.

Rooms.Name: Arasham's Tent
Rooms.Description:
This is a large smelly tent.  The tent has large cushions piled up for 
Arasham to sit on, old men like their comfort.  There is a cooked roast of 
milk fed veal, perfect for men who have no teeth.

Rooms.Name: Prison
Rooms.Description: This room is dark, dismal and damp.

Rooms.Name: Mirrelek's House
Rooms.Description:
This house has a low hard bed in the corner. There are also some rough 
chairs and a table in centre of the floor.

There are jars hanging from the ceiling, there is water dripping from them 
to keep the room cooler.

Rooms.Name: Doctors Receptionist
Rooms.Description:
Many useless items stock the shelves of this store.  The strange odour is 
strong and seems to be coming from the room next door.  You do recognise 
some of the items as crude healing potions.

Rooms.Name: Doctors Room
Rooms.Description:
This rooms stinks of chemicals, and the walls are lined with shelves filled 
with bottles of coloured liquid and boxed of strange substances

Rooms.Name: Cupboad
Rooms.Description: A dark and dismal cupboard.
